titleStmt.title: To His Grace His Majesty's High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament. The humble representation and petition of the Council-General of the Company of Scotland, trading to Africa and the Indies
titleStmt.author: Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.

notesStmt.note: Wing reports that it is dated "16th day of May 1700."
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
